# SeoPy

SeoPy - Instantly analyze your SEO issues.

## Installation

```bash
pip install seopy
```

## Usage

```python
import seopy
seopy.checkup("yourwebsitename.com") 

```
Enter your website name between double quotes and you're ready to go!

## Contributing
Pull requests are welcome. For major changes, please open an issue first to discuss what you would like to change.
